r.s: Provides extra data structures and iterable/array functionality.
r.d: teds (Tentative Extra Data Structures) is a collection of data structures and iterable functionality
r.n: * Make `Teds\strict_hash` ignore recursion caused by unrelated functions (e.g. var_dump calling `__debugInfo` calling `strict_hash`) * Add `Teds\binary_search(array $values, mixed $target, callable $comparer = null, bool $useKey=false)` * Change parent class of `Teds\StableMaxHeap` and `Teds\StableMinHeap` to `SplHeap`. * Fix deduplication when constructing `StrictSet` from `iterable`, `StrictMap` from `Traversable`. * Add `Teds\unique_values(iterable): array` using `strict_hash` to check for duplicates.
